revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Accept, yes overstroke from lin5 should be removed (cf. plate). Regarding N, Heilporn's solution (N( )) seems suitable, though presumably he meant (|N|).

Vote - ReturnToSender - Accept (I'm hitting Return only to have a 3rd voter's opinion). Looking at the picture, I could even think of removing the supraline in lines 2, 4 and 7 (though it's probably best to follow the editor here); this, with the note in the intro (see Sosin's comments), suggests to me we should write "(N( )) <#I=1#>" etc. I don't see how we could enter the editor's suggestion that this N( ) could stand for (a Latinized version of?) νόμαιος.

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Confirmed on plate: right to omit overstroke in lin5. The intro suggests that the N throughout presumably is the same as(?) ν(όμαιος) in 841 (see p.163), but I don't know what to do with it here. Next voter?
Eingabe nach ed.pr. In Z. 4 nach Abgleich mit Abb. gegen ed.pr. keine Überstreichung von II.
